detail_desc: Soft cotton jersey leggings in different designs with an elasticated waist.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Short nightslip in supersoft, patterned viscose jersey with a V-neck, elasticated lace trim around the neckline and below the bust, and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Lined at the top.

Pyjamas with a strappy top and shorts in supersoft, patterned viscose jersey. V-neck top with an elasticated lace trim around the neckline and below the bust, and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Lined at the top. Short shorts with an elasticated waist, wide legs and elasticated lace side stripes.
Sleeveless top in stretch jersey crêpe with a small, frill-trimmed stand-up collar and V-shaped opening with ties at the top.
Baby Exclusive. T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, press-stud on one shoulder and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Leggings in sturdy jersey made from a viscose blend with a wide waistband for a more comfortable fit and sewn-in creases down the legs.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, faux fur-trimmed hood. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, zipped side pockets and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, faux fur-trimmed hood. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, zipped side pockets and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.

Imitation suede loafers with imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Puff pants in organic cotton slub jersey with a front section in woven fabric with broderie anglaise. Elastication and a decorative bow at the waist and elasticated, frill-trimmed hems.
Wide, straight-cut blouse in woven fabric with covered buttons at the front. Small stand-up collar, an opening and buttons at the back of the neck and short puff sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs.
Wide, straight-cut blouse in woven fabric with covered buttons at the front. Small stand-up collar, an opening and buttons at the back of the neck and short puff sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs.

Socks in a soft, hole-patterned knit with elasticated tops.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a slightly wider neckline, short cap sleeves and a decorative knot detail at the hem. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a slightly wider neckline, short cap sleeves and a decorative knot detail at the hem. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Long jumper in a soft knit. Relaxed fit with a V-neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in soft viscose jersey with a print motif on the front, short dolman sleeves and a tie detail at the hem.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a seam centre front and a twisted detail at the hem.

Padded jacket in a quilted weave with a detachable, fleece-lined hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard, welt front pockets with a press-stud, and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Lined.

Two pairs of hoop earrings in metal and plastic, the larger pair with a tortoiseshell pattern. Diameter 3 cm and 4.5 cm.
Off-the-shoulder top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with narrow shoulder straps and short sleeves. Flounce at the top and smocking at the hem.

Padded jacket in a glossy weave with a holographic pattern. Detachable, lined hood with embroidery and appliqués, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets. Narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Padded parka in woven fabric with imitation leather details and a detachable, pile-lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. High stand-up collar, a zip and wind flap with buttons down the front, flap front pockets with a button, handwarmer pockets with press-studs, a zipped pocket on one sleeve and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.

Padded parka in woven fabric with imitation leather details and a detachable, pile-lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. High stand-up collar, a zip and wind flap with buttons down the front, flap front pockets with a button, handwarmer pockets with press-studs, a zipped pocket on one sleeve and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Long metal earrings with heart-shaped pendants decorated with sparkly stones and faux fur. Length 6 cm.

Ski gloves in windproof, water-repellent, functional fabric with folded seams, reinforced palm sections and reflective details. Elastication at the wrists and soft inner ribbing at the top. Plastic hook-and-eye fastening to keep the gloves together. Thinsulate™ lining. The gloves have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Sleeveless playsuit in soft viscose jersey with a text print on the front, decorative crossover straps at the back, an elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and short legs.
Sleeveless playsuit in soft viscose jersey with a text print on the front, decorative crossover straps at the back, an elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and short legs.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details, removable inserts, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and wide ribbing at the hem. Light support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
